name: The Curator (Feat. Judy Dyble / Julianne Regan) SHIPPING NOW)(Only until March 31st)
description:
Numbered copies, shipping now of the stunning debut by the Curator (Alistair Murphy) the man behind much of the music for the 2009 award winning Judy Dybe album Talking With Strangers produces a prog/folk epic with hauting and superb orchestral arrangements, complimenting strong melodies, and a definate touch of the avante garde..

National acclaim came from the Daily Mirror, who said '

****

At 50, Alistair Murphy's long-incubating musical dreams come to life in a grand folk/prog concept where invention battles indulgance. The inspirational "something good is coming soon" motif unlocks the key where a collaborative cast from  Fairport Convention, All About Eve and King Crimson help turn dreams into reality.

Essential listening for fans of No-Man, All About Eve, Fairport Convention, with musical styles drawn all the way from Pink Floyd to David Bowie.

Highly reccomended.

name: Judy Dyble - FRAGILE - Limited 7" vinyl EP (500 only) SHIPPING NOW(Until March 31st)
description:
Judy Dyble -  FRAGILE.

IN STOCK, AND SHIPPING NOW

Numbers from number 2 will ship strictly in order of purchase.

Release Date – 20 December 2010
Format 7” Picture disc's
Cat. No BM1011V
Label Brilliant/Genepool

# Limited to just 500 units
# Each individually numbered
# 180gm collectors vinyl
# Features the photography of Crimson
biographer Sid Smith.


Track listing
Waiting
Sparkling
Fragile

After the exalted full length award winning album release 'Talking With Strangers' in 2009, popular and critical demand has ensured this limited, instant collectors edition of the bonus tracks (outtakes just doesn't do these works justice) on a sumptuous, limited to 500 numbered picture disc, will be an essential 'must have' for Judy fans, and vinyl enthusiasts, genre collectors, and Fairport and Crimson types the world over.


# 180gm high quality collectors picture disc vinyl
# Strictly limited to 500 numbered units.
# Exclusive distribution only via HMV and artist websites.


Dyble's comeback has been astonishing, nods from influential journalists and critics the world over, an ever growing on line presence, and with a brand new album set for release in early 2011, her unique, and contemporary prog/folk leanings have brought a whole new world of fans to join hands with those already enthusiastic  for the 3 ground breaking albums she has composed over a 40 year + career.

Well packed for despatch, with additional siffeners, in mailer.

Features Tim Bowness/The Curator/Sand Snowman.

Side 1 features a vintage picture of Judy and her scenster husband (Simon Stable) circa 1970, never before relesed, and the B side features an iconic shot by King Crimosn illumini Sid Smith

name: Jackdaw 4 - RETROSPECTACLES - 2x LP, +  2 x cd package all for 10.00!(Only until March 31st)
description:
Sumptious 2 lp set of the first 2 J4 albums, one black, one white vinyl. Double gatefold, and the last few on half price sale now. 

Highly reccomended is the cd version of this, as well as the bands brand new album, 'The Eternal Struggle For Justice' available from Play, Amazon, HMV etc...

This special sale offer also includes a double cd issue of the same title..

name: MATTHEWS SOUTHERN COMFORT - Kind Of New - No'd SHIPPING NOW(Only until March 31st)
description:
Superb new album from Matthews Southern Comfort (first one in just 40 years) released to fanbase on September 6, pre-orders from here are the limited to 500 numbered only versions, and will be despatched in order of sale, from number 11. All of these copies will be despatched first class post on Wednesday 11th August 2010.

The album features 13 tracks, including a sublime remake of Woodstock, and features a 16 page booklet in a digi pack slipcase.
